_header: Saint Clement was I-bore at Rome by old daw
Subjects: saints’ lives; Clement, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Clement in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEynt Clement was ibore at rome bi olde daweOf þe hexte men he
                    com at rome þat were of þulke lawe…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…þer is nou seynt clements chirch I mad wiþ qinte
                    gynneGod ȝeue vs part of þulke Ioie þat is soule is
                    Inne

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint clement was I bore at rome by þe olde dawe& of
                    þe hyeste men he com of rome þat weren by þulke
                    lawe…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& þer he lyþ in his cherche Imad myd faire
                    ginneGod ȝeue vs part of þe ioye þat his soule is
                    inne

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
…Allas quaþ þis gode mon myne leue children
                    þreoWhi wole ȝe oure ffader bete wole ȝe me no more i
                    seo…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þere is now seint Clementes chirche y mad wiþ qweynte
                    ginneGod ȝif vs part of þat ilke ioye þat his soule is Inne.
                    A.M.E.N.
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
Begins imperfectly due to loss of folios 57-64; lines l-322
                    wanting.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Clement was I bore at Rome I furn bi olde daweOf þe
                    hexte men he was i come þa weren in þulke lawe…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Þare is nouþe Seint clementes churche I mad with quoynte
                    gynneGod ȝiue us part of þulke Ioyȝe þat Seint clement
                    is inne
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 322-40.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Clement was y bore At Rome bi olde daweOf þe hexte men
                    of Rome þat were of þilke lawe…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…per is nou seint clementȝ chirche made wiþ queinte
                    gynneGod ȝeue vs part of þilk ioye þat his soule is
                    inne
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
Seynt Clement was born in rome be þe olde daweof þe
                    gretest blod he com þat was þer of þat lawe…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…þo sche was to lond comyn & hir child sche myȝt not
                    fyndeffor care & sorwe þat sche had taken sche was ner out of hir
                    mynde

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Sayne Clement þe haly man borne he was at Rome& of þe
                    gretteste of þe cite we rede wele þat he comeHis fadre hight
                    ffanstyniane & his modre matidyanneTwo elder breþer he hade als
                    þaire names tell I canne…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…In rome is ȝit sayn Clement kuke made with mekil
                    wynneGod graunt vs parte of þat ioy þer his saule is
                    in

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
SAynt Clement was Iborn at Rome by old daweOf the heghest men he
                    was comen that wer of thilk lawe…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…And sayd that he monqueller was and wicch & ek
                    forsworeThat folk awayted him to slee in Antioche
                    therfore…
CamFitzMc128.Note: Ends imperfectly due to loss of folio(s).

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Clement was ybore at Rome by olde daweOf þe hexte men of
                    Rome he com þat were in þulke lawe…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þer is now Seint Clementes body in a chirche of queynte
                    gynneGod ȝiue vs part of þulke ioye þat his soule is now
                    ynne

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint clement was I bore atte rome by olde dayof þe hexte men
                    he com þat were of þulke lay…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…þer is now seint clementes churche ymad mid grete
                        sy gynnegod ȝif ous parte of þe Ioie þat his
                    saule ys Inne

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint clement was ibore at rome be olde saueof þe hexte men he com of rome þat were of þilke lawe…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …þer is nou sein clementis cherche ymad with quante gynnegod ȝiue ous part of þilke ioie þat his soule is Inne
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum lxxxiii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 190).

BLEge2810.First Lines: SEint clement was be holde tyme borne ate RomeOf þe hexte men þat weren in þe toune he come…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …þer is nou seint clementes churche ymad wiþ queinte ginneGod ȝeue ous part of þulke ioie þat is soule is inne

BLEge2891.First Lines: …Sire heo seide þat is mi sone tel me ware he beoI ne Wilny mi lyf no leng bote þat ich him Iseo…
BLEge2891.Last Lines: …þer is nou sein clementes churche Imad wiþ queinte gyneGod ȝiue us part of þulke ioie þat is soule is Inne
BLEge2891.Note: Lines 1-174 wanting:  begins imperfectly due to loss of folio or folios between 181 and 182.

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Clement was ibore at Rome bi olde daweOf þe hexte men of Rome þat were in Vulke lawe…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Þer is nou Seint Clementes churche ymaked wiþ queynte ginneGod ȝiue ous part of þulke ioye þat his soule is inne

BLSto949.First Lines: Seynt clement was ybore at Rome by olde daweOf þe hexte men he was y come þat were by þulke lawe…
BLSto949.Last Lines: …þer is nou Seynt clementis churche ymad wiþ queynte gynneGod ȝiue vs part of þulke ioyȝe þat seynt clement is inne

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Clement was born at Rome by olde daweOf þe hext men he
                    was comen þat weren in þat lawe…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Þere is now saynt Clementes chirche made with coynt
                    gynneNow god ȝeue vs part of þe ioye þat saynt clement is
                    ynne

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Clement was iborn at Rome by olde daweHe come of þe
                    heghest men þat were of þe lawe…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Ther is nowe seint Clementis chirch made with queynt gynneGod
                    ȝeue vs part of þat Ioye that his saule is Inne. Amen.
